signup.password_doesnt_match: Password does not match the Password Match Field
signup.the_password_should_contains_special_cha: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, one special character, and have a length of 8 characters.
signup.signup_success: Congratulations!, Your account has been successfully created.
signup.signup_success_description: We have sent an email to your email address. Please check your email for the link to verify your account.
signup.error_password_rules: Password must contain at least 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, 1 special character.
signup.unknown_error: An Error Occurred. Please try again later.
signup.error_credentials_signin_description: Please try again with another account.
signup.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address.

MISSING_PASSWORD.title: Missing Password
MISSING_PASSWORD.description: Please enter a password for your account.

INVALID_EMAIL.title: Invalid Email
INVALID_EMAIL.description: Please double-check your email address and make sure it's typed correctly.

EMAIL_EXISTS.title: Email Already Exists
EMAIL_EXISTS.description: This email is already in use. Try signing in or use a different email.

WEAK_PASSWORD.title: Weak Password
WEAK_PASSWORD.description: Please choose a stronger password (at least 6 characters) for better security.

INVALID_API_KEY.title: API Key Error
INVALID_API_KEY.description: There's a problem with your API key. Please check it and try again.

OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED.title: Sign-up Not Allowed
OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED.description: Sign-up is currently disabled. Contact support for assistance.

login.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
login.error_credentials_signin_description: Please try again with another account.
login.password_length_error: The Password must contain at least 8 characters.
login.OAuthSignin_description: Error occurred while constructing the authorization URL.
login.OAuthCallback_description: Error occurred while handling the response from the OAuth provider.
login.OAuthCreateAccount_description: Could not create OAuth provider user.
login.EmailCreateAccount_description: Could not create email provider user.
login.Callback_description: Error occurred in the OAuth callback handler.
login.OAuthAccountNotLinked_description: Email on the account is already linked, but not with this OAuth account.
login.EmailSignin_description: Sending the e-mail with the verification token failed.
login.SessionRequired_description: The content of this page requires you to be signed in at all times.

footer.copyright: All rights reserved for Hassanah 2024 Â©

error.AccessDenied_description: You cannot access this account. It may have been deleted, blocked, or is temporarily unavailable, Please try again later.

signedout.you_dont_have_account: You don't have account for this action.

emailVerification.subject: Verify Your Email Address for Hassanah
emailVerification.body: Thank you for signing up for Hassanah! To complete your registration and access all the features of our platform, please verify your email address by clicking the link below:
emailVerification.disclaimer: If you did not sign up for Hassanah, please disregard this email.

verify.success_verification: Your account has been successfully verified.
